Choose Object Dialogs¶

CommonDialogActionOption¶

class CommonDialogActionOption(context: sims4communitylib.dialogs.option_dialogs.options.common_dialog_option_context.CommonDialogOptionContext, on_chosen: Callable[[...], Any] = <function CommonFunctionUtils.noop>)¶

Bases: sims4communitylib.dialogs.option_dialogs.options.objects.common_dialog_select_option.CommonDialogSelectOption

An option that invokes a callback upon being chosen.

CommonDialogObjectOption¶

class CommonDialogObjectOption(option_identifier: str, value: DialogOptionValueType, context: sims4communitylib.dialogs.option_dialogs.options.common_dialog_option_context.CommonDialogOptionContext, on_chosen: Callable[[str, DialogOptionValueType], Any] = <function CommonFunctionUtils.noop>)¶

Bases: sims4communitylib.dialogs.option_dialogs.options.common_dialog_option.CommonDialogOption

A option the player can choose within a dialog.

as_row(option_id: int) → ui.ui_dialog_picker.ObjectPickerRow¶

Convert the option into a row.

property option_identifier¶

Used to identify the option.

property value¶

The value of the option.

CommonDialogSelectOption¶

class CommonDialogSelectOption(option_identifier: str, value: DialogOptionValueType, context: sims4communitylib.dialogs.option_dialogs.options.common_dialog_option_context.CommonDialogOptionContext, on_chosen: Callable[[str, DialogOptionValueType], Any] = <function CommonFunctionUtils.noop>)¶

Bases: sims4communitylib.dialogs.option_dialogs.options.objects.common_dialog_object_option.CommonDialogObjectOption

An option that invokes a callback, passing in its value.

property icon¶

The icon of the option.

CommonDialogToggleOption¶

Bases: sims4communitylib.dialogs.option_dialogs.options.objects.common_dialog_object_option.CommonDialogObjectOption

An option with two states, on or off.

Choose this dialog option.

property icon¶
